Juliano Efson Norberto Sales

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4325641038422361
  • Última atualização do currículo em 04/09/2019

Juliano Sales is a PhD Researcher at the University of Passau, Germany. He also holds a MSc and a BSc in Computer Science respectively from the Federal University of Ceará (UFC) and the State University of Ceará (UECE). Before joining the University of Passau, he was part of the Insight Centre for Data Analytics at the National University of Ireland, Galway (NUIG) and worked as a Software Engineer for more than 8 years at the Banco do Nordeste in Fortaleza, Brazil. (Texto informado pelo autor)
